actions.committee: House Committee on Post Office and Civil Service
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Post Office and Civil Service.

committees.committee: House Post Office and Civil Service

official_title: A concurrent resolution expressing the sense of the Congress with regard to compliance with laws relating to equal employment opportunity in the competitive service of the Federal civil service.

summary.text: Expresses the sense of Congress that compliance with the provisions of Title VIII of the Civil Rights Act of 1964 (prohibiting employment discrimination) or any other law relating to equal employment opportunity should not result in positions being excepted from the competitive service in the Federal civil service and should be accomplished by means which do not adjust Federal civil service standards.

titles.title: A concurrent resolution expressing the sense of the Congress with regard to compliance with laws relating to equal employment opportunity in the competitive service of the Federal civil service.
